name: Darkest AFK - idle games RPG
description:
The “Heroic subscription” gives you access to the following privileges within a particular period of time:
- Hero Exp earned in IDLE is increased by 25%
- Hero Exp earned in the Mines of Abyss is increased by 25%

The “Golden subscription” gives you access to the following privileges within a particular period of time:
- Basic gold earned in IDLE is increased by 25%
- Gold earned in the Mines of Abyss is increased by 25%

Each subscription costs $ 0.99 per week and is automatically renewed when the initial subscription term expires. (Price may vary depending on your location.)
The Subscription cycle is 1 week.
Purchasing the Subscription requires the same methods of payment used to make any kind of purchase in the app.
How to cancel the Subscription: to cancel or modify your Subscription, you need to open your account page in the app store and change the corresponding settings.
Subscription Renewal: at the end of the cycle, the Subscription will automatically be renewed for one more cycle.

User Agreement: https://www.darkestafk.com/terms_and_conditions.html
Privacy Statement: https://darkestafk.com/privacy_policy.html
